name: Bakushow Mondai no Totsugeki! Star Pirates: Dai-4-wa
overview: Bakushow Mondai no Totsugeki! Star Pirates is a Downloadable 4-part Soundlink game for the Satellaview that was broadcast in at least 2 distinct runs between June 22, 1997 and November 29, 1997. The game features voice narration by the Japanese comedy duo, Bakushow Mondai.
